generalSettings.value:
Welcome to [superbank.com](https://www.superbank.com) SonarQube.
Please log in using your GitHub account

permissionTemplates.description: This permission template will be used as default when no other permission configuration is available
A wrong template whose projectKeyPattern would select a single project... at best. This is probably not the intended behavior. Templates make sense only if used for multiple projects
A template with no permissions granted. This makes little sense

permissionTemplates.key: 9. Bad template - Permissions granted to Anyone
permissionTemplates.description: A permission template that grants permissions to Anyone (ie unauthenticated users), this is a bad practice

permissionTemplates.key: 9. Bad template - Permission templates granted to users
permissionTemplates.description: A bad perm template with perms granted directly to user

rules.description: Par convention __init__ retourne un object de la classe, donc it ne doit pas y avoir de return
Ben sinon pourquoi to catch l'exception pour re-raiser?

instantiated.description: You should not run programs starting by rogue
Don't write fuck or shit in code

Don't use shit or fuck in comments

instantiated.description: Track presence of custom tokens for company specific app

params.value:
matching:
  pattern: "\\bCORP_SECRET_\\d{10}\\b"
  context:
     patternAround:
         pattern: "<CorpConnectionSpec>"
         maxLineDistance: 10
         maxCharDistance: 500

instantiated.description: Make sure that you don't commit files that contain Siemens secrets of the format SIEMENS_XXXXXXXX

extended.description: En Francais: Les constantes doivent suivre des conventions de nommage
Avec la meme version en francais

Traduction francaise de la regle:
Il ne faut pas comparer les objets avec == si la methode equals n'a pas ete surchargee

Actually in the context of an ``if``, parens are necessary:
``if value in ("foo", "bar")`` for instance
Par convention __init__ retourne un object de la classe, donc it ne doit pas y avoir de return
Ben sinon pourquoi to catch l'exception pour re-raiser?
